member.name: M:SqlServerSpatial.Toolkit.BaseLayer.BingMapsTileSystem.MapSize(System.Int32)
member.summary: Determines the map width and height (in pixels) at a specified level of detail.
member.param: Level of detail, from 1 (lowest detail) to 23 (highest detail).
member.returns: The map width and height in pixels.

member.name: M:SqlServerSpatial.Toolkit.BaseLayer.BingMapsTileSystem.GroundResolution(System.Double,System.Int32)
member.summary: Determines the ground resolution (in meters per pixel) at a specified latitude and level of detail.
member.param: Latitude (in degrees) at which to measure the ground resolution.
Level of detail, from 1 (lowest detail) to 23 (highest detail).
member.returns: The ground resolution, in meters per pixel.

member.name: M:SqlServerSpatial.Toolkit.BaseLayer.BingMapsTileSystem.MapScale(System.Double,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Determines the map scale at a specified latitude, level of detail, and screen resolution.
member.param: Latitude (in degrees) at which to measure the map scale.
Level of detail, from 1 (lowest detail) to 23 (highest detail).
Resolution of the screen, in dots per inch.
member.returns: The map scale, expressed as the denominator N of the ratio 1 : N.

member.name: M:SqlServerSpatial.Toolkit.BaseLayer.BingMapsTileSystem.LatLongToPixelXY(System.Double,System.Double,System.Int32,System.Int32@,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Converts a point from latitude/longitude WGS-84 coordinates (in degrees) into pixel XY coordinates at a specified level of detail.
member.param: Latitude of the point, in degrees.
Longitude of the point, in degrees.
Level of detail, from 1 (lowest detail) to 23 (highest detail).
Output parameter receiving the X coordinate in pixels.
Output parameter receiving the Y coordinate in pixels.

member.name: M:SqlServerSpatial.Toolkit.BaseLayer.BingMapsTileSystem.PixelXYToLatLong(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Double@,System.Double@)
member.summary: Converts a pixel from pixel XY coordinates at a specified level of detail into latitude/longitude WGS-84 coordinates (in degrees).
member.param: X coordinate of the point, in pixels.
Y coordinates of the point, in pixels.
Level of detail, from 1 (lowest detail) to 23 (highest detail).
Output parameter receiving the latitude in degrees.
Output parameter receiving the longitude in degrees.

member.summary: Converts pixel XY coordinates into tile XY coordinates of the tile containing the specified pixel.
member.param: Pixel X coordinate.
Pixel Y coordinate.

member.name: M:SqlServerSpatial.Toolkit.BaseLayer.TilePlacementCache.Suggest(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: But : ne pas autoriser de chevauchements, ne pas autoriser de trous Implem : pour X : recherche en X-1 pour chech si PosX = posX(x-1) + width(x-1) pour Y : recherche en Y-1....

member.name: M:SqlServerSpatial.Toolkit.SpatialTrace.ShowDialog
member.summary:
Displays the trace viewer with the current trace opened. Warning: do not use this in production code
Important : the _isEnabled is not useful there because user can call Disable() Better to recheck debugger attachment or enablement in AppSettings

member.name: M:SqlServerSpatial.Toolkit.Viewers.SpatialViewer_GDI.TintBitmap(System.Drawing.Bitmap,System.Drawing.Color,System.Single)
member.summary: Tints a bitmap using the specified color and intensity.
member.param: Bitmap to be tinted
Color to use for tint
Intensity of the tint. Good ranges are .25 to .75, depending on your preference. Most images will white out around 2.0. 0 will not tint the image at all
member.returns: A bitmap with the requested Tint
